content: {"name": "Salvation Army", "services": ["Food Pantry"], "state": "HI", "address": "219 Ponahawai St, Hilo, HI 96720 (Downtown Hilo)", "city": "Hilo", "zip": "Hilo)", "phone": "(808) 935-1277", "hours": "Monday: Friday, 9am-11am (except holidays)   \nLocation Notes:\n             \u2022 Bring proof of household size and names of each member.", "notes": "", "latitude": 19.720804453697, "longitude": -155.085811966604, "source": "the_food_basket_inc_hi", "food_bank": "The Food Basket, Inc."}
